com.c301t19.cs.ualberta.seekaride.core

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.c301t19.cs.ualberta.seekaride.core.LoginController

  • public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller that handles login and account creation.

    Issues: may want to implement a more rigorous account creation/login process in the future.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String username)
        Logs the user in with their desired username. A new account is created if a user doesn't already exist with the given name. The name must be at least five characters long. Rider and Driver controller classes are instantiated with a Profile generated from the username.
        Parameters:
        username - The user's username.
        Returns:
        true if the login was successful.
